channel.title: Mauersegler.swift
channel.description: In the log term, this will be a blog about using Swift. My Name is Elmar Kretzer. I am partner and engineer at symentis.com. I am co-organizer of iOS Munich Meetup group.

item.title: Kinda unwrap Optionals
item.description:
Optionals. Sometimes it is a little bit ugly to force unwrap things.

You know there is a value. You add a ! But then things change and your code breaks. So in case you need to gracefully handle this, you add a.maybeVal ?? "".

Much better, but possibly a lot to read when used in combination with other stuff.

let r4 = (a1.a ?? "") + (a2.a ?? "")

But swift gives us protocols. ðŸŽ‰ So wouldnt it be nice to (maybe) have another option â€¦
